questions.question: Set in the sky atop giant clouds, this arc features a battle against the 'God' of Skypiea, Enel, and the discovery of an ancient bell. What is...?
This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates arrive at the ghostly island of Zou, home to a tribe of Minkmen and a crucial ally in their journey. What is...?
This ability, used by a notorious pirate, grants the power to produce and control mochi. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and control earthquakes. What is...?
This Devil Fruit power allows its user to manipulate and create biscuits at will. What is...?
This character, the captain of the Kid Pirates, is known for his metal manipulation powers and rivalry with Luffy. Who is...?
This character, originally from Drum Island, is noted for his blue-nose and ability to shapeshift. Who is...?
This character, a former Revolutionary Army commander, is known for his ability to create destructive earthquakes with the Gura Gura no Mi. Who is...?
